title: Devices used to play video games in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2009 to 2018
summary: The given chart is of multi-line type with 7 lines namely Games console and TV, Computer, Mobile phone, Handheld games console, Tablet, Portable media player, and Smart TV. The y axis represents Share of respondents and the x axis represents Year.

Overall Mobile phone, Tablet, and Smart TV are gradually increasing, Games console and TV, Computer, and Handheld games console are gradually decreasing, Portable media player is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
Overall across the Year, Games console and TV mostly maintained the highest Share of respondents when compared to others with a mean value of 20.7, and it peaked at 2009, and 2011.
Followed by Mobile phone which ranks as the second topmpost line , with an average of 17.3 Share of respondents,reaching its highest point  at 2015 with a value of 26.0.
Smart TV mostly had the least Share of respondents with a mean value of 0.8, which peaked at 2017, and 2018 with a value of 2.0.

Overall Mobile phone, Tablet, and Smart TV are gradually increasing, Games console and TV, Computer, and Handheld games console are gradually decreasing, Portable media player is roughly constant,  throughout the Year

Throughout the period, Games console and TV generally had the highest Share of respondents relative to others with an average of 20.7, and it reached its maximum at 2009, and 2011 with a value of 27.0.
After Games console and TV, Mobile phone overall has the second highest values , with a mean value of 17.3, peaking at 2015.
The botommost line, Smart TV,  has a mean of 0.8, and peaked at 2017, and 2018.
